docs.snippet: Although the former Polytechnic University officially became the N.Y.U. Polytechnic School of Engineering, some of its sports teams were allowed to remain intact....
docs.lead_paragraph: Although the former Polytechnic University officially became the N.Y.U. Polytechnic School of Engineering, some of its sports teams were allowed to remain intact.
docs.abstract: Former Polytechnic University officially became NYU Polytechnic School of Engineering on Jan 1, after start of the academic semester, several Polytechnic sports teams, called NYU-Poly, have been allowed to remain intact through the end of their respective spring seasons; as a result, dozens of NYU-Poly athletes are competing in various sports for a school that exists only in their memories.
